00032 void RequestCache::insert(uint32_t id, IOHandler *handler, DispatchHandler *dh, boost::xtime &expire) {
00033   CacheNodeT *node = new CacheNodeT;
00034 
00035   HT_DEBUGF("Adding id %d", id);
00036 
00037   IdHandlerMapT::iterator iter = m_id_map.find(id);
00038 
00039   HT_EXPECT(iter == m_id_map.end(), Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00040 
00041   node->id = id;
00042   node->handler = handler;
00043   node->dh = dh;
00044   memcpy(&node->expire, &expire, sizeof(expire));
00045 
00046   if (m_head == 0) {
00047     node->next = node->prev = 0;
00048     m_head = m_tail = node;
00049   }
00050   else {
00051     node->next = m_tail;
00052     node->next->prev = node;
00053     node->prev = 0;
00054     m_tail = node;
00055   }
00056 
00057   m_id_map[id] = node;
00058 }

00061 DispatchHandler *RequestCache::remove(uint32_t id) {
00062 
00063   HT_DEBUGF("Removing id %d", id);
00064 
00065   IdHandlerMapT::iterator iter = m_id_map.find(id);
00066 
00067   if (iter == m_id_map.end()) {
00068     HT_DEBUGF("ID %d not found in request cache", id);
00069     return 0;
00070   }
00071 
00072   CacheNodeT *node = (*iter).second;
00073 
00074   if (node->prev == 0)
00075     m_tail = node->next;
00076   else
00077     node->prev->next = node->next;
00078 
00079   if (node->next == 0)
00080     m_head = node->prev;
00081   else
00082     node->next->prev = node->prev;
00083 
00084   m_id_map.erase(iter);
00085 
00086   DispatchHandler *dh = node->dh;
00087   delete node;
00088   return dh;
00089 }

00093 DispatchHandler *RequestCache::get_next_timeout(boost::xtime &now, IOHandler *&handlerp, boost::xtime *nextTimeout) {
00094 
00095   while (m_head && xtime_cmp(m_head->expire, now) <= 0) {
00096 
00097     IdHandlerMapT::iterator iter = m_id_map.find(m_head->id);
00098     assert (iter != m_id_map.end());
00099     CacheNodeT *node = m_head;
00100     if (m_head->prev) {
00101       m_head = m_head->prev;
00102       m_head->next = 0;
00103     }
00104     else
00105       m_head = m_tail = 0;
00106 
00107     m_id_map.erase(iter);
00108 
00109     if (node->handler != 0) {
00110       handlerp = node->handler;
00111       DispatchHandler *dh = node->dh;
00112       delete node;
00113       return dh;
00114     }
00115     delete node;
00116   }
00117 
00118   if (m_head)
00119     memcpy(nextTimeout, &m_head->expire, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00120   else
00121     memset(nextTimeout, 0, sizeof(boost::xtime));
00122 
00123   return 0;
00124 }

00128 void RequestCache::purge_requests(IOHandler *handler) {
00129   for (CacheNodeT *node = m_tail; node != 0; node = node->next) {
00130     if (node->handler == handler) {
00131       HT_DEBUGF("Purging request id %d", node->id);
00132       node->handler = 0;  // mark for deletion
00133     }
00134   }
00135 }
